testcase.classname: To validate Booking functionality of Adactin
testcase.name: To verify Login functionality of Adactin Hotel with Valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User enter into Adactin application...................................passed When User enter Username ,Password and clicks Login button..................passed Then User navigated to Search Hotel page....................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate Booking functionality of Adactin
testcase.name: To verify user can search a hotel with given credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User has to be there in Search Hotel page.............................passed When User selects the Location,Hotel,Room Type,No of Rooms,Check In Date,Check Out Date,Adults per Room,Children per Room and clicks Search Button.passed Then User navigated to Select Hotel page....................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate Booking functionality of Adactin
testcase.name: To verify user can select the hotel
testcase.system-out: Given User has to be there in Select Hotel page.............................passed When User selects the hotel and click continue..............................passed Then User navigated to Book A Hotel Page....................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate Booking functionality of Adactin
testcase.name: To verify user can book a hotel
testcase.system-out: Given User has to be there in Book A Hotel Page.............................passed When User enter Firstname,Lastname,BillingAddress,CreditCardNo,CreditCardType,ExpiryDate,CVVNo and click BookNow button.passed Then User navigated to Booking Confirm Page.................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate Booking functionality of Adactin
testcase.name: To verify user get Booking Confirmation Details
testcase.system-out: Given User has to be there in Booking Confirm Page..........................passed When User Prints OrderNo and clicks MyItinerary.............................passed Then User navigated to Booked Itinerary.....................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate Booking functionality of Adactin
testcase.name: To verify user can see booked Hotels
testcase.system-out: Given User has to be there in Booked Itinerary page.........................passed When User checks the booked hotel and click Logout..........................passed Then User navigates to Logout Page..........................................passed
